ComicInfo.Title: The Fatal Orgasm
ComicInfo.Summary: AboutReprints the stories originally published by The Georgia Straight in 1973.Collected stories The Fatal Orgasm: Private eye Vito Yaruntski is hired by a woman to find Dr von Shittz who has dissapeared from Wimpole Cosmetics work one month prior, and appears to be related to a string of murders that have been committed in the recent month. Harold Hedd's "Bike Song": We follow around Harold Hedd as he rides along the city on his bike singing his "Bike Song"... Quantum Pulls A Fast One:The Quakster visits a gentlemens club and pulls a fast one. The Origin Of Beaverman: This short story explores the origin story of Beaverman, the scourge of the north. Harold Head (Continuing Adventures Of): Harold comments on a book about sex. Kuolu Kala: Dr. Turd, a shrink murders his patients and inadvertedly creates a monster. A monster that goes on a rampage and needs to be stopped! Buckets Of Saliva: In one of the worlds most prominent cities lurks a horror of untold magnitude! Festering and swilling to a dangerous degree, it waits to spew forth all manner of fearsome goop!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-19 03:15:51. [CVDB279417]
